name: Cowboy Chaos
description:
Set in the good 'ol wild west, Cowboy Chaos is a two-player game where you must blast each other off a rocky platform. The catch? You have no control of what will pop out of your gun. A baseball? A boomerang? A volley of peas?

This town aint big enough for the two of you, so have fun firing at each other!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 (which happens to be my first game jam).

All art and coding by Joshua Day. Music is by Chris Haugen,  Sir Cubworth, and E's Jammy Jams respectively, and is taken from the Youtube audio library. Sound effects come from there as well.
